title: En direct Dermatose : Sébastien Lecornu convoque plusieurs ministres à Matignon pour une réunion sur l'agriculture, à 10h30

title: Budget de la « Sécu » : avec la méthode du compromis, Sébastien Lecornu réussit son pari
snippet: French Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu has won his first bet. On Tuesday, December 9, his government successfully passed a social security budget in the Assemblée Nationale despite not having a majority.

title: French PM warns of 'loss of control' over social security spending | Reuters
snippet: French Prime Minister Sebastien Lecornu attends the questions to the government session at the National Assembly in Paris, France, December 2, 2025.

title: Sébastien Lecornu - World news, culture and opinion
snippet: Prime Minister Sébastien Lecornu is banking on Socialist support to pass the social-security budget – a make-or-break moment for his strategy of compromise and negotiation. Published on December 2, 2025, at 2:54 pm (Paris) Solenn de Royer

title: French PM scores big win as social security budget clears major hurdle – POLITICO
snippet: But Sébastien Lecornu isn’t out of the woods yet. Listen · AI generated Text-to-speech · Free article usually reserved for subscribers · Lecornu will have little time to celebrate, however, as there still remains the matter of the state budget, a separate piece of legislation where compromise has proved arguably more contentious. | Alain Jocard/AFP via Getty Images · December 9, 2025 7:52 pm CET ·
